publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-798.1 Bob Doris: Improving the Central Heating Programmeâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-798) in the name of Karen Whitefield, after "installation" insert "notes that the current terms of the programme resulting in such delays were established by the Labour-Liberal Democrat administration".

S3M-798.1 Improving the Central Heating Programme (lodged on 9 November 2007) Rob Gibson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Keith Brown*, Alex Neil*, Brian Adam*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*
